reviews.text: It's just a disgrace I mean if you are short on staff why not recruiting?! Long queue and not enough people on the tills. 😡

Clearly understaffed, making existing staff unhelpful. My train got cancelled so I went to the information desk to get help on the best way for me to get home, and staff were too busy with the trains and office work to help customers - long lines were starting to form! Staff didn't really seem to want to help and when I followed their advice I found myself with many other people at the other station's information desk being told that Peterborough's staff always get things wrong and that we shouldn't have taken the train we did. Overall, not impressed.
It's a train station so not expecting much. Not much seating or space to wait when weather is bad and trains delayed.
Facilities at this station are awfull - with so many people waiting for connections I'm amazed it isn't better!

Rubbish, left at Peterborough Railway Station after college at the age of 16 all the way to dark because the trains were all cancelled. I was crying on the phone to parents because I didn’t know what train to get and staff didn’t really help me get the right train and platform. They were clueless until one member actaully helped. Thameslink and Station will be reported
